text: Building at Kleine-Gartmanplantsoen 7-9 in Amsterdam, which houses a bar on the ground floor, and on the first floor the artist's association De Kring, est. 1922. Artists Society De Kring was founded on September 23, 1922 by artists and intellectuals who looked for a home away from home in Amsterdam. De Kring is a private club and becoming a member takes place by means of ballot. Category:Arts organisations based in the Netherlands Category:Arts organizations established in 1922 Category:1922 establishments in the Netherlands
title: De Kring
